[16:10] and that's because 80% of energy is non-renewable like oil and coal we need to add more Renewables like solar and wind but the electrical grid is a huge bottleneck in our journey to do so it actually takes 2 to 8 years to add a solar farm or or wind turbine to the grid and the physical grid infrastructure can't accommodate the increasing demand for energy and adding Renewables plus as we all know electricity is expensive so the solution that we've come up with is to apply recent advances in Ai and machine learning to leverage AI for energy demand management to reduce emissions just as an example imagine 10 cars come home to a neighborhood or a corporation they all plug in at once at 6:00 p.m. this creates what's called a peak load which the grid may not be able to handle but if we apply AI at that site so the cars intelligently charge at different times throughout the night and when everyone wakes up all their cars are charged that minimizes the peak load this is called load shaving or Peak shifting uh sorry load shifting or Peak shaving and this allows to make the grid more stable to be able to add more Renewables we've created a full demo here um and I'm excited to show you it afterwards if you want to come take a look this is the back end this is the energy generation forecast and we're excited that um on the left you can see here this is urot a utility provider's prediction you can see the difference between the lines is quite Stark so they have pretty bad um predictions whereas we have an r squared of 097 which I'm quite excited about and the benefits of being able to apply this methodology are to be able to add more Renewables like like solar and wind to the grid switch to Electric faster reduce emissions and also importantly reduce electricity cost a major priority of Corporations and consumers in terms of traction we've created our initial

[46:31] here's how we're solving for it so our sensors monitor resident situation constantly for example sleep patterns emotions and eventually a fall in terms of an incidence or even risk of incidents alerts are automatically sent to caregivers through text messages or phone calls We Gather all of this data from our sensors to monitor situation but also to access this easily for caregivers do not miss anything and EV for us to train in even further our algorith do not miss anything and provide even better recommendations such as in this case risk of turn risk of fall and other important statistics as well our solution is to empower facilities to focus on what matters the most first yse AI or facilities will plug in yse a no complicated onboarding process required second y will provide insight that on seniors at risk of churn and these insights will include um actionable items for caregivers to focus on what matters most as a result facilities will experience less move outs and increased Revenue how do we do this through our multimodal sensors that monitors and identifies residents at churn at risk via a fa prediction with a 92% accuracy sensan analysis and activity tracking highlighted as the most common causes of hospitalizations for elderly in addition we provide actionable care recommendations for every resident so that caregivers don't have to think twice about what do we have to do next this all leads to lower avoidable turn higher occupancy and more Revenue we're the first multimodal Ai and varable free tool that's uniquely focused on reducing r Insurance the current Solutions are fragmented focusing either on audio or video or they force facilities to buy expensive Hardware whereas we can seamlessly integrate with most of the devices that these facilities are already using and frankly there's not a lot of competition in the B2B space right now given the

[1:22:58] professionals and event planners we knew that there had to be a better way and that's why we created Fiesta Pro um we would not have been able to solve this problem last year but with AI agents coming online now we're able to tackle it for the first time ever so our solution is an AI agent with our MVP we're going to start with venue and vendor collaboration that's a process that traditional involves endless back and forth with Fiesta Pro we're going to save 60 hours of time and $2,000 for an event of 150 people um and that's just the beginning as a next step we want to add a central hub for seamless stolder collaboration so you can handle your approvals and your attendee engagement all in one place along the way we're going to be gathering data both from the event spaces that we work with and from our clients to provide actionable insights and creative tailored recom recommendation so we can really enhance corporate events and there's a bigger picture here people are craving more human connection and that's what we really care about most of us in this room spend most of our time at work our Grand Vision is to use our technology and the data that we're Gathering to transform corporate events into meaningful experiences that people are going to be talking about for years to come um we have a demo of our product um so here our AI agent is autonomously sourcing venues it's contacting them about their availability about their amenities their pricing it's making recommendations for us and then it's handling the preliminary negotiations back and forth Fiesta Pro is already making event planning smarter faster and stress-free um so why now uh AI as Dave was just saying can communicate with websites and human beings via voice and via text that is brand new in the world right now and it
